裦字的基本解释

裦
bāo
古同“褒”。

裦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bāo］
［《廣韻》博毛切，平豪，幫。］
亦作“褒1”。亦作“裦1”。亦作“裒3”。
(1)衣襟宽大。
(2)高大；广大。
(3)嘉奖；称赞。与“貶”相对。
(4)古代祭祀时的九拜之一。
(5)烹饪方法的一种。
(6)古国名。故址在今陕西省勉县东南。
(7)古谷名。
(8)指周幽王后褒姒。
(9)姓。
[②]［póu］
［《集韻》蒲侯切，平矦，並。］
同“裒1”。
聚集。

裦字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　裦； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1118第14
【類篇】房尤切，音浮。【集韻】聚也。【正字通】褎字之譌。○按裦，博毛切，美也，與褎音義各別。今从《集韻》《類篇》分見。

裦字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
裦字的起名意思

暂无。

裦
Basic explanation of words
裦
bāo
Gu Tong "praise".
裦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bāo］
["Guangyun" Bo Maoqie, Pinghao, Bang. ]
Also known as "praise 1". Also known as "裦1". Also known as "裒3".
(1) The skirt is wide.
(2) Tall; vast.
(3) Awards; praise. Contrast with "depreciation".
(4) One of the nine worships in ancient sacrifices.
(5) One of the cooking methods.
(6) Ancient country name. The former site was in the southeast of Mian County, Shaanxi Province.
(7) Ancient valley name.
(8) Refers to the praise of Queen Zhou You.
(9) Last name.
[②]［póu］
["Ji Yun" Pu Houqie, Ping Yu, and. ]
Same as "裒1".
Gather.
裦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　裦; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1118 Page 14
【Classes】The room is especially cut, and the sound is floating. [Ji Yun] Ju Ye. 【Zhengzitong】Zhizizhizhi. ○According to 裦, Bo Mao cut, Mei Ye, and 褎 sound and meaning are separate. See now from "Jiyun" and "Like Pian".
